entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
